explanation: [0-0] A man with a long white beard, wearing a black outfit with the words "BALMAIN PARIS" printed on it, stands on the dark gray floor in front of a hotel's brown revolving door, holding a black object in his right hand. The words "HOTEL de PARIS" are hanging above the hotel entrance. On the left side of the frame, there are marble pillars next to the hotel entrance and steps leading down to the floor.

[0-2] As the man in black walks down the steps, the scene switches to him arriving on the street. The man in black is walking on the pavement. To his left stands a man wearing a light gray top and a black hat who is taking pictures. On the left side of the frame are several black and white cars parked on the roadside and some buildings.

[2-4] The camera then cuts to the man in black walking up to a bright blue sports car and opening the door. As the man continues walking forward, the scene changes again. The man in black, holding a steering wheel in both hands, is standing next to the bright blue sports car. Not far behind him, some people wearing sunglasses are looking at the blue sports car beside him.
